title: I Can’t Believe This Is Real Life

sentences.b05e: I Can’t Believe This Is Real Life

sentences.b570: I am, as of yesterday, officially a production assistant at Dreamworks Animation.

sentences.a266: I was first asked if I’d be interested in interviewing when a writer for Dreamworks read my work on Medium. That blows my mind. Medium has legitimately absolutely changed my life!

sentences.4257: Exciting times!!! Have a great day everybody! Whoooo!!

content: I Can’t Believe This Is Real Life I am, as of yesterday, officially a production assistant at Dreamworks Animation. AHHHHH!!!!!! I was first asked if I’d be interested in interviewing when a writer for Dreamworks read my work on Medium. That blows my mind. Medium has legitimately absolutely changed my life! Exciting times!!! Have a great day everybody! Whoooo!!
